availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, fireman. Native of Ireland. Married Bridget McCoy Meagher in Jefferson County on February 7, 1858. Father of Harriet Meagher and John Meagher. Fireman for the Louisville and Nashville Railroad in Louisville in 1865.

ab.bibl:
Marriage Records: Kentucky Marriages (Richmond, KY: Madison County Courthouse), film no. 000819608, p. 299.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 2, p. 151A.
Edwards’ Annual Director to the Inhabitants, Institutions, Incorporated Companies, Manufacturing Establishments, business Firms, Etc., Etc., in the City of Louisville for 1865-66 (Edwards, Greenough & Deved, Publishers), p. 435.
Edwards’ Annual Director to the Inhabitants, Institutions, Incorporated Companies, Manufacturing Establishments, business Firms, Etc., Etc., in the City of Louisville for 1866 (Edwards, Greenough & Deved, Publishers), p. 807.
